court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR
outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 650/2013 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -I,KOYILANDY CRIME NO.30/2013 OF Chelannur Excise Range Office , Kozhikode PETITIONERS : 1 SHIJESH AGED 38 YEARS S/O. CHOYIKUTTY, ERANJOL
full_text: pete (a) a35kN Pas j 2 2021/KER/1230 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE P.V.KUNHIKRISHNAN FRIDAY, THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2021 / 18TH POUSHA, 1942 Crl.MC.No.4118 OF 2013 AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 650/2013 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -I,KOYILANDY CRIME NO.30/2013 OF Chelannur Excise Range Office , Kozhikode PETITIONERS : 1 SHIJESH AGED 38 YEARS S/O. CHOYIKUTTY, ERANJOLI, ELATHUR AMSOM DESOM, KOZHIKODE TALUK. 2 JOY M.M. AGED 48 YEARS S/O. MANI, MUTTATHKATTEL HOUSE, MALOTH VILLAGE, PUNNAKUNNU P.O., HOSDURG TALUK, KASARAGOD DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRI.NIREESH MATHEW RESPONDENT : STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. SRI.SANTHOSH PETER, SR.PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 08.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Blea al P.V.KUNHIKRISHNAN, J Cri.M.C.No.4118 of 2013 Dated this the 8 day of January, 2021 ORDER When this case came up for consideration, the Public Prosecutor submitted that the petitioners are already acquitted after facing trial. Hence, this Crl.M.C is infructuous. Therefore, the same is dismissed as infructuous. Sd/- P.V.KUNHIKRISHNAN, JUDGE cms
